    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_268bf4599f61b1c5e6453ed0540f6d117053e172</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The orbit of the Moon around the Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Bahn des Mondes um die Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'orbite de la lune autour de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A órbita da lua em torno da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'orbita della luna intorno alla terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τροχιά του φεγγαριού γύρω από τη γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La órbita de la luna alrededor de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure shows the Moon's elliptical orbit around the Earth. The orbit illustrates that at certain times the Moon gets closer to the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ellipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elliptical orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar system</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung zeigt die elliptische Bahn des 
Mondes um die Masse. Die Bahn veranschaulicht, daß zu 
bestimmten Zeiten der Mond näeher an der Masse erhält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure montre l'orbite elliptique de la lune 
autour de la terre. L'orbite illustre que par moments la lune 
obtient plus près de la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura mostra a órbita elíptica da lua em 
torno da terra. A órbita ilustra que por vezes a lua começa 
mais perto da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura mostra l'orbita ellittica della luna 
intorno alla terra. L'orbita illustra che a certi momenti la 
luna ottiene più vicino alla terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός εμφανίζει ελλειπτική τροχιά του φεγγαριού 
γύρω από τη γη. Η τροχιά διευκρινίζει ότι σε ορισμένους 
χρόνους το φεγγάρι φτάνει πιό κοντά στη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura muestra la órbita elíptica de la luna
alrededor de la tierra. La órbita ilustra que a veces la luna 
consigue más cercano a la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ellipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elliptische Bahn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarsystem</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
